snippet: In a line of work that usually operates out of the limelight, Servando Gómez has put himself — often with prominent people — in front of the camera.
abstract: Servando Gomez, one of most sought-after Mexican drug lords, is taunting authorities in interviews and videos on social media; in his most recent, Gomez, who is known as La Tuta, or the teacher, appears with the son of a former governor of Michoacan, suggesting his gang’s deep infiltration of the political class; authorities are investigating.
lead_paragraph: In a line of work that usually operates out of the limelight, Servando Gómez has put himself — often with prominent people — in front of the camera.

headline.main: Mexican Drug Lord Taunts the Authorities With Videos
headline.print_headline: Drug Lord’s Videos Taunt Mexican Authorities
